display_long_description:
📣 **FAN FAVORITE UPDATE!** 📣

By popular request: Creative Mode is now unlocked at the start of the game! 🎨 If you want to jump right in to creating, decorating and cuteness, this update is for you! Please keep sending us your reviews and feedback! Every little thing helps us improve. 😽

# 🏝️ Build An Animal Oasis
Use Quest’s surface tracking technology to turn your furniture into lush ecosystems where cute critters can grow and thrive.[media]

# 🏆 Solve Quests to Progress
Complete quests to reveal new biomes, animal and plant species, and decorations.[media]

# 🌈 Breed New Color Variants
Maintain generations of animals over time to unlock a kaleidoscope of new colors.[media]

# 😻 Create a (Virtual) Pet
Turn your favorite animal into a life-sized pet! Play with your pet to keep it happy and it will reward you by digging up treasures.[media]

# 🧩 Multiple Play Modes 
Maintain healthy habitats in Normal Mode, solve tricky puzzles in Challenge Mode, or relax and let your creativity run free in Creative Mode.[media]

# 🌻 Customize Your Environment
Decorate not just your animal islands, but your entire room - with plushies, Polaroids, plants and more.[media]

Bring your home to life with Living Room! 🌱
